item_condition.description: If specified, the specified actions and modifier(s) will only apply to food items that fulfills this condition.

item_action.description: If specified, this item action type will be executed on the remaining item stacks that was consumed.

replace_stack.description: If specified, this item stack will replace the item stack that was consumed *after* consuming it.

food_modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will apply to the food amount gained by eating a food item.

food_modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will apply to the food amount gained by eating a food item.

saturation_modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will apply to the saturation amount gained by eating a food item.

saturation_modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will apply to the saturation amount gained by eating a food item.

entity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the player that has ate a food item.

always_edible.description: Determines whether a food item can be eaten regardless of the player's hunger bar being full.

prevent_effects.description: If set to `true`, prevent status effects from being applied.
